name: Italian Crock Pot Chicken
ingredients: 1 pkg. dry Italian dressing 1 can cream of chicken soup
1 8 oz. cream cheese softened 1 can chicken broth
steps: ½ c. butter 4-­‐6 chicken breasts or thighs
Place chicken breasts in crock pot, mix remaining ingredients and pour over chicken. Cook 5-­‐6 hours on low.
